frame.name: Risky_situation
frame.definition:
<def-root>A particular <fen>Situation</fen> is likely (or unlikely) to result in a harmful event befalling an <fen>Asset</fen>. The <fen>Situation</fen> may be a state, an activity, or some focal entity that must be inferred to be part of some larger Situation involving both it and the <fen>Asset</fen>. Although the idea of a harmful event is crucial to the understanding of this frame, it is not expressible as an argument of the LUs in this frame.
<ex><m>Is</m> <fex name="Situation">climate change</fex> <t>dangerous</t> <fex name="Asset">for mankind</fex>?</ex> <ex>Customers can make complaints about <t>unsafe</t> <fex name="dan_ent">products</fex>.</ex> <ex>The primary <t>risk</t> <m>is</m> <fex name="Asset">to our infrastructure</fex>.</ex>
See the Run_risk frame for discussion on differentiation regarding the noun <ment>risk</ment>.</def-root>

FE.name: Situation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Situation</fen> which may lead to a harmful event.
<ex>Most people agree, <fex name="Situation">going over 100mph</fex> <m>is</m> <t>unsafe</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Asset
FE.definition:
<def-root>Something judged to be desirable or valuable which might be lost or damaged.
<ex>Honey is not <t>safe</t> <fex name="Asset">for babies</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the actual level of security from the expected value given the <fen>Situation</fen> and the state indicated by the target itself.
<ex>Rogue nations <m>are</m> our <fex name="Degree">greatest</fex> <t>threat</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>A particular location for which the <fen>Situation</fen> is safe. Frequently, it is to be inferred that the characteristics of the location make various <fen>Situation</fen>s safe or unsafe.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time period during which the <fen>Situation</fen> has the specified level of safety.</def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Domain</fen> in which the <fen>Situation</fen> is safe.
<ex>All of our websites <m>are</m> <fex name="dom">educationally</fex> <t>safe</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Dangerous_entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>A concrete or abstract entity which may come to cause the loss of, or damage to the Asset.
<ex><fex name="Dangerous_entity">That man</fex> is a <t>risk</t>!</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Circumstances</fen> in which an <fen>Asset</fen> is at risk.</def-root>
